name: Extra Coin
storyline: Extra Coin is a one-of-a-kind adventure game with a special focus on exploration and a rich lore, set within a virtual social network called The Arcade: a digital place where everyone can achieve fame and fortune and make their dreams come true. You play as Mika, a girl determined to find her lost parents after they abandon their mortal existence. Will you be able to discover the hidden truth behind their disappearence? Dive into The Arcade: explore the virtual world, challenge your foes in exciting matches, choose your friends and unlock unique bromances, customize your character stats, game style and design, climb the rank, earn new followers and reach the top!
summary: Extra Coin is a unique game with heavy adventure and exploration elements in which your choice matters! Dive into The Arcade: explore the virtual world, challenge your foes in exciting matches, choose your friends, customize your character stats, game style and design and reach the top!
